Text: wen i get this how do i put it 2 disk?

Does anyone know where I can find the songs from Breath of fire: Dragon Quarter?
Have been searching for them desperatly.

To load disc 2 Download Daemon Tools, just search Bitcomet for it and it should be a minimized program in the bottom right corner along with the other running programs, click it and go to the file that the game you are trying to load is in and click disc two.
